text: Javiera Catalina Roa Silva (born 27 February 1995) is a Chilean footballer who plays as a forward for Santiago Morning and the Chile women's national team. ==International career== Roa made her senior debut for Chile on 29 August 2019 in a 1–0 friendly win against Costa Rica. == References == Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Chilean women's footballers Category:Chile women's international footballers Category:Footballers at the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Colo-Colo (women) footballers Category:Santiago Morning footballers Category:Youth Olympic gold medalists for Chile
title: Javiera Roa
